clara.rules
Interface WorkingMemory

public interface WorkingMemory

An immutable working memory of Clara rules.

Method Summary
 WorkingMemory fireRules()
          Fires any pending rules in the working memory, and returns a new working memory with the rules in a fired state.
 WorkingMemory insert(java.lang.Iterable<?> facts)
          Returns a new working memory with the given facts inserted
 java.lang.Iterable<QueryResult> query(java.lang.String queryName)
          Runs the query by the given name against the working memory and returns the matching results.
 java.lang.Iterable<QueryResult> query(java.lang.String queryName, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> arguments)
          Runs the query by the given name against the working memory and returns the matching results.
 WorkingMemory retract(java.lang.Iterable<?> facts)
          Returns a new working memory with the given facs retracted
 

Method Detail

insert

WorkingMemory insert(java.lang.Iterable<?> facts)
Returns a new working memory with the given facts inserted

Parameters:
facts - facts to insert into the working memory
Returns:
a new working memory with the facts inserted

retract

WorkingMemory retract(java.lang.Iterable<?> facts)
Returns a new working memory with the given facs retracted

Parameters:
facts - facts to retract from the working memory
Returns:
a new working memory with the facts retracted

fireRules

WorkingMemory fireRules()
Fires any pending rules in the working memory, and returns a new working memory with the rules in a fired state.

Returns:
a new working memory with the rules in a fired state.

query

java.lang.Iterable<QueryResult> query(java.lang.String queryName,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> arguments)
Runs the query by the given name against the working memory and returns the matching results. Query names are structured as "namespace/name"

Parameters:
queryName - the name of the query to perform, formatted as "namespace/name".
arguments - query arguments
Returns:
a list of query results

Parameters:
queryName - the name of the query to perform, formatted as "namespace/name".
Returns:
a list of query results
